page.title: 09N.Forest Council Departments
page.content: The Council is separated into 6 sections. A chief executive is in charge of all the departments and a chief officer oversees each department. { Leisure:}This is less important than the rest of the departments. They ensure the community is well catered for with leisure services. {Planning:}This department maintains the quality of the new buildings up to the present standard of the old. {District Secretaries:}This caters for a range of problems and includes the Committee Administrators who summarise the outcome of meetings on paper. {Technical Departments:}This covers refuse collecting and some sewage matters.An architectural team is employed to provide building services for the local authority. {Treasurers:}Concerned with finance.
